sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"中等的，平均的，适中的"之意。
means: medium ： 指按照某种标准来说是适中或中等的。这种标准可以是通过仪器测量而来，也可能是凭经验而得出。
mediam ： 指中间位置的，统计学上指处于中间位置的一个数的。
average ： 通常用来形容优劣难分的平庸或折衷情况，也指理论上的平均标准。

word_mean: 正中的：位于机体或结构的正中平面或正中线的
中位数：将随机变量的概率分布分成两半的数值，即观察值的一半在中位数上方，而另一半在中位数的下方
于有限群体或样本中按逐步增加的序列安排，中位数处于奇数值的正中位，以或偶数值的当中两位取其平均数

sentence.Network_en: Where the speed distribution is skew, it's better to quote the median speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在速度分布是扭曲的情况下, 最好用中值速度.

sentence.Network_en: One half of its values will be found below and one half above the median.
sentence.Network_cn: 一半数值低于中位数,一半数值高于中位数.

sentence.Network_en: The median interval between onset of symptoms and diagnosis was three months.
sentence.Network_cn: 3例有家族史,且均为姊妹配对.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 中位数 - 基本概况中位数（Median）是统计学名词。将数据排序（从大到小或从小到大）后，位置在最中间的数值（或最中间两个数 …
AE中英文对照 ... Match Grain → 匹配颗粒 Median → 中值 Noise → 噪波.
•中数(median) 位于一列有序排列的数字中间的那个数。 •最低胜任力测验(minimum-competency test) 针对某一特定目的，测量一个学 …
PS快捷键_百度百科 ... Despeckle－（ 去斑） Median－（ 中间值（median）） Color Halftone－（ 彩色半调）.

list.abs: 数学词汇英语翻译(S-Z) ... sample mean 样本均值 sample median 样本中位数 sample moment 样本矩.
median line 中线median point 中点mediant 中间数
四肢运动时与身体的正中面(MEDIAN PLANE)平行;快速跑步时更加接近正中面,小跑时接近中点,动作从容,前肢没有抬高时后背线保持拉直状态。比利时牧羊犬在连续行走时也不.
年龄中位数(Median age)：将全体人口按年龄大小排列，位于中间的那个人的年龄。也称为中位年龄。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a median vein or nerve): from medieval Latin medianus, from medius 'mid'

entry.tran: 中间值的;中位数的;中间的
entry.def: The median value of a set of values is the middle one when they are arranged in order. For example, if a group of five students take a test and their marks are 5, 7, 7, 8, and 10, the median mark is 7.
A median is the same as a median strip .

means.word_mean: 1. the value below which 50% of the cases fall
1. relating to or constituting the middle value of an ordered set of values (or the average of the middle two in an even-numbered set);

sentences.sentence: "the median income for the year was $15,000"

means.word_mean: 2. dividing an animal into right and left halves
3. relating to or situated in or extending toward the middle

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立即的,即时的;直接的,最接近的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im无+medi中间+ate……的→无中间的→立刻的
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
medi中间+ocre石山→中间的山→不是高山→平庸
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+ion表名词→n.调解
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+or人→n.调停者,仲裁人
medi中间+ate表动词→在[中间]走→调停,调解

Sentence.sentence: Median (中位数的) pay for chief executives of Sfor chief executives of S&P 500 companies fell 6.P 500 companies fell 6.8% in 2008.
The overthrown giants of Wall Street took the biggest knock, with average pay cuts of 38% and median bonuses of zero
But there was some pain for everyone: median pay for chief executives of non-financial firms in the S&P 500 fell by 2.7%.

In 2008 the net cost of attending a four-year public university – after financial aid – equaled 28% of median (中间的) family income, while a four-year private university cost 76% of median family income.
